skillTree.localised_description: Very rare and virtually extinct, even in Lustria, the Horned One's preternatural swiftness puts it way ahead of other Cold Ones.
Unique and terrifying flying reptiles that are just as much a danger to their riders as the enemy!
Only the eldest, largest and most ferocious of their kind can move the Engines of the Gods!

effects.description: Mount: Ancient Stegadon (Engine of the Gods)

skillTree.localised_description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: More than just a fantastic orator, Tehenhauin leads his armies personally across Lustria in a crusade against the vermin parasites.
First comes the vermin, then comes the plagues, but it will end with the eradication of the Skaven - for they play no part in the Old Ones' plans.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who followed Tehenhauin knew the what would befall Lustria if they faltered. The prophecy must be seen through to the bitter end.

effects.description:
Armour: +20 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sotek's children swarm to Tehenhauin's call, vicious serpents that turn the tide of battle in the Prophet's favour.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sotek's prophecy spoke of ruin and destruction but also of hope; with the vermin menace eradicated, the Lizardmen would rebuild anew.
To fulfil the prophecy and overcome the Skaven assault on Lustria, Sotek gifted great power to his followers.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Lore of Beasts spells

skillTree.localised_description: Idolised by his followers, Tehenhauin attracts the loyalty of some of the finest Skink spawnings in all of Lustria.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Word of the Serpent-God has opened many Skinks’ eyes to Tehenhauin’s holy cause.
Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...
The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

skillTree.localised_description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

skillTree.localised_description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

skillTree.localised_description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection – a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

skillTree.localised_description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

factionEffects.localised_description: The first and greatest Prophet of Sotek led the Lizardmen to fight the Skaven after the City of Gold fell to rodent-spawn’s vile plague. His journey was filled with great battles and countless sacrifices in the name of the vengeful Serpent-God.

effects.description: Upkeep: +200% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units until completing Stage 1 of the Prophecy of Sotek
Sacrificial offerings gained from winning battles can be offered to Sotek to receive a variety of powerful rewards.
Rite cost: -75% for Rite of Sotek

items.colour_text: Upon this stone plaque is inscribed an extract of the Prophecy of Sotek that grants additional warding to Tehenhauin.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: At times of great import, a single Red Crested Skink emerges from the deep jungle, claiming the title of the once and future Prophet of Sotek.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Skinks units
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
